title: Full ahead Rhine
brief_description: Follows the journey of three of the thousands of barges which ply regularly up and down the Rhine and its tributaries. Describes some of the main towns, Dusseldorf, Cologne, Stuttgart Ludwighaven, and the industries of the areas surrounding the waterways, including coal mining, iron, steel, chemical, and primary industries.
